components.Find Grades: You can view your grades by clicking on the Grades link in the navitation menu of our Canvas course.

policies.late_work: Zero unless instructor is notified 24 hours before or after the deadline
policies.plagiarism: Zero on assignment, F in course, reported to Dean
policies.missed: If you miss submitting an assignment, you will receive a zero for that assignment, unless otherwise approved by the instructor per prior communication between student and instructor.
policies.late: Late work will receive a zero, unless otherwise approved by the instructor per prior communication between student and instructor.
policies.response: I will respond within a few minutes or the hour if contacted during my office hours. Otherwise, I will respond during my next available office hours.
